pull_requests.title: Dockerize Rusty Kaspa
pull_requests.body:
# Docker Implementation for Rusty Kaspa

## Overview
This PR adds comprehensive Docker support to Rusty Kaspa, making it easy to run Kaspa nodes across different platforms without complex build dependencies.

## Features

### Core Docker Implementation
- **Multi-stage Dockerfile** - Optimized build process with separate builder and runtime stages
- **Docker Compose setup** - Complete orchestration for mainnet, testnet, and devnet
- **wRPC Proxy** - High-performance Borsh-encoded wRPC proxy for wallet connectivity
- **Named volumes** - Cross-platform compatible storage using Docker managed volumes

### Network Support
- **Mainnet** - Production-ready mainnet node with wRPC proxy
- **Testnet** - Testing environment with full node functionality  
- **Devnet** - Development environment for testing new features
- **Monitoring** - Optional Prometheus and Grafana integration

### User Experience
- **Quick start script** - `./docker-start.sh` for easy node management
- **Environment configuration** - Flexible `.env` based configuration
- **Health checks** - Built-in container health monitoring
- **Port management** - Clear port mapping for all services

## üìã What's Included

### New Files
- `Dockerfile` - Multi-stage build with Rust toolchain
- `docker-compose.yml` - Complete service orchestration
- `docker-start.sh` - User-friendly startup script
- `env.example` - Configuration template
- `DOCKER.md` - Comprehensive Docker documentation
- `README-DOCKER.md` - Docker-specific README

### Updated Files
- `README.md` - Added Docker Quick Start section
- `.gitignore` - Excludes personal monitoring configurations

## üîß Technical Details

### Architecture
- **Base image**: `rust:1.82-slim` for building, `debian:bookworm-slim` for runtime
- **Security**: Non-root user (`kaspa`) with proper permissions
- **Performance**: Release builds with optimized binaries
- **Compatibility**: Works on Linux, macOS (with root user), and Windows

### Port Configuration
| Network | gRPC | wRPC Borsh | wRPC JSON | P2P |
|---------|------|------------|-----------|-----|
| Mainnet | 16110 | 17110 | 18110 | 16111 |
| Testnet | 16210 | 17210 | 18210 | 16211 |
| Devnet  | 16610 | 17610 | 18610 | 16611 |

### Key Features
- **UTXO Index** - Enabled by default for wallet support
- **wRPC Borsh** - Fast binary encoding for wallets
- **Health monitoring** - Automatic container health checks
- **Volume persistence** - Data survives container restarts
- **Network isolation** - Dedicated Docker network

## üöÄ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone and setup
git clone https://github.com/kaspanet/rusty-kaspa
cd rusty-kaspa

# Start mainnet node
./docker-start.sh mainnet

# Access your node
# gRPC: localhost:16110
# wRPC Borsh: localhost:17110 (for wallets)
# P2P: localhost:16111
```

## üß™ Testing

### Verified Working
- ‚úÖ Mainnet node startup and sync
- ‚úÖ wRPC proxy with Borsh encoding
- ‚úÖ Container health checks
- ‚úÖ Volume persistence
- ‚úÖ Cross-platform compatibility (Linux, macOS)
- ‚úÖ Monitoring integration (Prometheus + Grafana)

### Test Commands
```bash
# Test mainnet
./docker-start.sh mainnet
docker compose --profile mainnet ps

# Test with monitoring
./docker-start.sh -m mainnet

# Clean up
./docker-start.sh -c
```

## üîç Benefits

### For Users
- **Easy setup** - No complex build dependencies
- **Consistent environment** - Same experience across platforms
- **Quick deployment** - Minutes instead of hours to get running
- **Production ready** - Optimized for real-world usage

### For Developers
- **Isolated testing** - Clean environment for development
- **Easy debugging** - Containerized logs and monitoring
- **CI/CD ready** - Docker-based testing and deployment
- **Documentation** - Comprehensive setup and usage guides

## ÔøΩÔøΩ Configuration

The implementation supports extensive configuration via environment variables:
- Log levels and performance tuning
- Network peer limits and RPC settings
- Monitoring and security options
- Development and testing features

## üìö Documentation

- **DOCKER.md** - Complete Docker implementation guide
- **README-DOCKER.md** - Docker-specific documentation
- **Updated README.md** - Quick start instructions
- **Inline comments** - Detailed configuration explanations

## üêõ Known Limitations

- **macOS permissions** - Containers run as root to avoid filesystem permission issues
- **Resource requirements** - Minimum 4GB RAM and 10GB disk space
- **Initial sync time** - First startup requires blockchain download
